projects.title: Audio Transcription Tool
projects.description: Multi-threaded Python application with GUI for efficient audio-to-text conversion, featuring speech recognition and progress tracking.

projects.title: Encrypted Text Editor
projects.description: Java-based text editor implementing AES encryption and secure file handling with an intuitive GUI interface.

projects.title: MindLoop Personal Data Tracker
projects.description: Comprehensive Java application for personal data tracking featuring advanced encryption and modular architecture.

projects.title: PDF Processing Suite
projects.description: Collection of Python scripts for PDF manipulation including text extraction, highlighting changes, and merging documents.

projects.title: Screen OCR Tool
projects.description: Background service for instant OCR text extraction from screen captures using hotkeys.

projects.title: Employee Schedule Bid Optimizer
projects.description: Automated schedule parsing and optimization tool for airline employee bidding system.

projects.title: CS 240 Multiset Implementation
projects.description: Advanced Java project implementing generic types and custom data structures.

projects.title: Y86 CPU Simulator
projects.description: Complete implementation of CPU simulator including loader, disassembler, and interpreter.

projects.title: Email Summary System
projects.description: Advanced email management tool utilizing the Outlook API and AI for automated email summarization, filtering, and organization with a comprehensive statistics dashboard.

projects.title: Disk Analysis Suite
projects.description: Command-line utility for comprehensive disk space analysis, featuring file type statistics, large file identification, and customizable exclusion paths with human-readable output.

projects.title: Automated Backup System
projects.description: Robust backup solution with intelligent file handling, progress tracking, and detailed logging. Features selective backup with exclusion paths and administrative access detection.

projects.title: NFL Sports Betting & Fantasy Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive web application for NFL sports betting and fantasy football analysis, featuring real-time data integration, advanced statistics, and predictive modeling.

projects.title: Sports Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time sports data visualization platform featuring moneyline predictions, point spread analysis, and fantasy lineup optimization using the ESPN NFL API.

projects.title: PSYC Textbook Content Extractor
projects.description: Selenium-based web scraper that automatically navigates through university authentication, extracts textbook content chapter by chapter, and compiles it into organized text files. Features automated DUO handling and smart content parsing.

projects.title: Interactive Flashcard Scraper
projects.description: Automated tool for extracting digital flashcards from online study materials. Features interactive card flipping simulation and intelligent content extraction, saving study materials in an easily reviewable format.

projects.title: YouTube Playlist Transcript Collector
projects.description: Comprehensive tool for downloading and organizing video transcripts from YouTube playlists. Creates both individual transcripts and a master compilation, with smart title parsing and error handling.

projects.title: Word Hunt Solver
projects.description: Interactive Python application using PyQt5 for solving word hunt puzzles. Features multi-threaded processing, custom Trie data structure, and an intuitive GUI with path visualization.
